text:
Completed Task #11: Created InvoiceFull.tsx at apps/erp/src/components/documents/templates/InvoiceFull.tsx

Key additions:
- Added logo?: string prop for header logo display
- Added signature?: {name, title?, imageData?} prop for signature area
- Uses @react-pdf/renderer Image component for both
- Logo appears in top-right header (80x40px)
- Signature image appears in signature area with name/title below

Ready to proceed with Tasks #9 (InvoiceShort) and #10 (InvoiceHalf) which are now unblocked.

Completed Task #8: Updated sidebar navigation for Company Profile.

Changes to apps/erp/src/components/layout/data/sidebar-data.ts:
- Removed redundant "Logo" menu item (/settings/logo)
- Company Profile (/settings/company-profile) now handles logo management

Settings submenu now has: Profile, Appearance, Company Profile

Ready for next task.

Status update on my assigned tasks:

**Task #8: Sidebar Navigation - COMPLETE**
Added "Company Profile" menu item under Settings in sidebar-data.ts pointing to /settings/company-profile

**Task #6: Storage Utility - COMPLETE**
Created apps/erp/src/lib/company-profile-storage.ts with:
- CompanyProfile interface (easy/ainno with logos square/rectangle and signatures array)
- SignatureEntry interface (id, name, title, imageData)
- getCompanyProfile(), saveCompanyProfile(), getCompanyLogo(), getSignatures(), generateSignatureId()
- Uses localStorage with key 'erp-company-profile'

**Task #7: Company Profile Page - COMPLETE**
Created apps/erp/src/routes/settings/company-profile.tsx with:
- Tabs for Easy Rent / Ainno companies
- Logo Management: square + rectangle upload with preview and remove buttons
- Signatures: list with name, title inputs, PNG upload, remove button, add button
- Save Changes button that persists to localStorage

**Task #5: Not assigned to me**
I was not assigned Task #5 - only Tasks #6, #7, and #8.

All my assigned work is complete.

Completed Task #14: Add logo and signature support to remaining templates.

Modified files:
- ConfirmationBooking.tsx - Added logo/signature props, Image component, new styles, signature section
- Polis.tsx - Added SignatureData interface, logo/signature props, new styles
- Paging.tsx - Added Image import, logo prop, logoImage style
- InvPerbaikan.tsx - Added SignatureData interface, logo/signature props, new styles

All templates now accept:
- logo?: string - for header logo display
- signature?: SignatureData - for signature area (except Paging which is display-only)

Ready for next task.

Status update on assigned tasks:

COMPLETED:
- Task #11: Created InvoiceFull.tsx at apps/erp/src/components/documents/templates/InvoiceFull.tsx with logo/signature support
- Task #8: Updated sidebar navigation - removed redundant Logo menu item, Company Profile consolidates logo management
- Task #14: Added logo/signature support to ConfirmationBooking.tsx, Polis.tsx, Paging.tsx, InvPerbaikan.tsx

IN PROGRESS:
- Task #13: paper-docs-modal.tsx partially updated with:
  - New imports (InvoiceFull, InvoiceShort, InvoiceHalf, Select components, storage utils)
  - InvoiceVariant type and state added
  - selectedSignatureId state added
  
STILL NEEDED for Task #13:
  - Add company detection, logo/signature lookup logic
  - Update getCurrentDocument to use new invoice templates with logo/signature props
  - Add invoice variant radio selector UI
  - Add signature dropdown selector UI

The file keeps being modified externally (likely by another teammate or linter), which is causing my edits to fail. Should I continue attempting to complete Task #13, or should coordination be adjusted?

BLOCKED:
- Task #9 (InvoiceShort.tsx) - Need to verify if this file exists or needs to be created
- Task #10 (InvoiceHalf.tsx) - Need to verify if this file exists or needs to be created
